templates.title: RomM
templates.description: Scan, enrich, and browse your game collection with a clean and responsive interface. With support for multiple platforms, various naming schemes and custom tags, RomM is a must-have for anyone who plays on emulators.
templates.name: romm
templates.note: The RomM Project on GitHub

templates.title: RomM ComM
templates.description: A Discord bot that integrates with the RomM API to provide information about your ROM collection and conrol RomM from Discord.
templates.name: romm-comm

env.name: TOKEN
env.label: Token
env.description: Your Discord bot token

env.name: GUILD
env.label: Guild ID
env.description: Discord server (guild) ID

env.name: API_URL
env.label: Base URL for RomM Instance
env.description: Base URL for local Romm instance (http://ip:port)

env.name: USER
env.label: User
env.description: API authentication username

env.name: PASS
env.label: Pass
env.description: API authentication password

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Domain
env.description: Website domain for any download links, can use local ip/port if not exposing RomM to the internet (default: 'No website configured')

env.name: SYNC_RATE
env.label: Sync rate
env.description: How often to sync with API in seconds (default: 3600)

env.name: REQUESTS_ENABLED
env.label: Requests enabled
env.description: Enable request commands (default: true)

env.name: IGDB_CLIENT_ID
env.label: IGDB client ID
env.description: IGDB login info for requests metadata (can be the same one used in RomM)

env.name: IGDB_CLIENT_SECRET
env.label: IGDB client secret
env.description: IGDB login info for requests metadata (can be the same one used in RomM)

env.name: ENABLE_USER_MANAGER
env.label: Enable user manager
env.description: Enables user manager module (default: true)

env.name: AUTO_REGISTER_ROLE_ID
env.label: Auto register role ID
env.description: Discord role ID used for linking Discord users to RomM users and registering new RomM users if granted to Discord user (if user manager enabled)

env.name: UPDATE_VOICE_NAMES
env.label: Update voice names
env.description: Enable/disable voice channel stats (default: true)

env.name: CHANNEL_ID
env.label: Channel ID
env.description: Channel ID for API sync result and user manager notifications to be sent to (if enabled above) and user manager log messages

env.name: SHOW_API_SUCCESS
env.label: Show API Success
env.description: Show API sync results and error messages in Discord (default: false)

env.name: CACHE_TTL
env.label: Cache Time To Live
env.description: Cache time-to-live in seconds (default: 3900)

env.name: API_TIMEOUT
env.label: API Timeout
env.description: API request timeout in seconds (default: 10)
